column2: an A.M. Eatery////Don't Snooze on the Snooze
column3: lol Really good food! My brother and I went here after a meeting and we had brunch
column5: buddy so good. I had the cinnful pancakes with bacon
column6: mmmm. Melts in your mouth and not in your hand. The best pancakes that I have had in a very long time and the bacon was exactly the way I like my bacon
column9: and crunchy. I ate really good when we went here and I will be back again. I would have givem them five stars but the wait was long.
